sections.title: About Blur Image
content: Apply blur effects to images for artistic purposes, privacy protection, or to create depth of field effects. Adjustable blur intensity for precise control.

sections.title: Gaussian Blur Formula
content: Applied to each pixel using weighted average of neighbors

sections.title: Blur Types
content: Gaussian Blur: Smooth, natural-looking blur effect
Motion Blur: Simulates movement in a specific direction
Radial Blur: Blur radiating from a center point
Box Blur: Fast, uniform blur effect
Lens Blur: Simulates camera depth of field

sections.title: Common Uses
content: Privacy: Blur faces, license plates, or sensitive information
Artistic Effects: Create dreamy or soft-focus images
Background Blur: Emphasize subjects with bokeh effects
Reduce Noise: Smooth out grainy images
Web Graphics: Create subtle background effects
